attributes.action: Grant residency to soliders of the Gurka regiment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the goverment to allow members of the Gurka regiment who have served in the British army for 15 years or more to be granted residency in the UK.These are people whom the British people owe a debt to .

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gurkha-soldiers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
